sentences.en: An olive-coloured tent stood within a thicket of trees.
sentences.cn: 一顶橄榄色帐篷扎在树丛当中。
冰雹不断地砸在帐篷上.

sentences.en: He drew back the tent flap and strode out into the blizzard.
sentences.cn: 他拉开帐篷的门帘，大步走进暴风雪中。

sentences.en: He had pitched his tent in the yard.
sentences.cn: 他在院子里搭起了帐篷。

sentences.en: He waved the servants out of the tent.
sentences.cn: 他挥手让仆人们退到帐篷外。

sentences.en: I'm afraid the wind may blow the tent away.
Mom wants to know if you guys still have that two-person tent.
sentences.cn: 妈妈想知道你们是否还有那顶双人帐篷。

sentences.en: Slack up the tent ropes before it rains.
sentences.cn: 在下雨之前把帐篷的绳子放松.

sentences.en: Small things stirred in the grass around the tent.
sentences.cn: 一些小东西在帐篷四周的草丛里窸窸窣窣地动着。

sentences.en: The tent began to sag under the weight of the rain.
sentences.cn: 雨水使得帐篷中间开始下坠。

sentences.en: They had a midnight feast in their tent.
sentences.cn: 他们在帐篷里举行了一次午夜宴会.

sentences.en: They pitched their tent in a little clearing in the wood.
sentences.cn: 他们在树林里的一块小空地上支起了帐篷.

sentences.en: We just need a tent supported on a rigid framework.
sentences.cn: 我们正需要一座有坚硬架子支撑的帐篷.

sentences.en: We looked for a flat spot where we could pitch our tent (= put up our tent ) .
sentences.cn: 我们寻找一个平缓的地方搭帐篷。

sentences.en: You spent the whole weekend in a tent in the rain? That's masochism!
sentences.cn: 下着雨，你就在帐篷里度过了整个周末？真是自讨苦吃！

words.tran_cn: 张布架；张布钩；看管人；帮手
盖孔法；封孔；斜张天幕；[海洋] 海冰隆起（海冰受挤压拱起成帐幕状）
遮盖；掩蔽；隆起；用帐篷遮盖（tent的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 大帐篷政策（包容各种不同的政治和社会观点）
帐篷城（搭有很多帐篷的社群的别称）

trans.tran_en: a shelter consisting of a sheet of cloth supported by poles and ropes, used especially for camping

trans.tran_cn: 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿
